# Allows you to create your own dynamic keys
# to be called in localization.
# defined_text -> this is it, we're defining the text
# text -> a discrete entry that can be picked to display in loc.
# trigger -> determines if a text entry will be picked or not.
# (The triggers need to be valid for the scope the key is called in
# (eg Root or From.From).)
# localization_key -> points to the localization key
# that'll be used if trigger passes

defined_text = {
    name = GetGoodsType
    text = {
        trigger = { 
            check_variable = { goods_type_temp = 1 }
        }
        localization_key = "life_goods"
    }
    text = {
        trigger = { 
            check_variable = { goods_type_temp = 2 }
        }
        localization_key = "everyday_goods"
    }
    text = {
        trigger = { 
            check_variable = { goods_type_temp = 3 }
        }
        localization_key = "luxury_goods"
    }
    text = {
        trigger = { 
            check_variable = { goods_type_temp = 4 }
        }
        localization_key = "services"
    }
    text = {
        trigger = { 
            check_variable = { goods_type_temp = 5 }
        }
        localization_key = "raw_goods"
    }
    text = {
        trigger = { 
            check_variable = { goods_type_temp = 6 }
        }
        localization_key = "industrial_goods"
    }
}
defined_text = {
    name = GetGoodsType2
    text = {
        trigger = { 
            check_variable = { goods_type_2_temp = 1 }
        }
        localization_key = "life_goods"
    }
    text = {
        trigger = { 
            check_variable = { goods_type_2_temp = 2 }
        }
        localization_key = "everyday_goods"
    }
    text = {
        trigger = { 
            check_variable = { goods_type_2_temp = 3 }
        }
        localization_key = "luxury_goods"
    }
    text = {
        trigger = { 
            check_variable = { goods_type_2_temp = 4 }
        }
        localization_key = "industrial_goods"
    }
    text = {
        trigger = { 
            check_variable = { goods_type_2_temp = 5 }
        }
        localization_key = "services"
    }
}
#Currency Icon
    defined_text = {
        name = GetCurrencyIcon
        text = {
            trigger = {
                currency_uses_dollar = yes
            }
            localization_key = "GFX_currency_dollar"
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                currency_uses_pound = yes
            }
            localization_key = "GFX_currency_pound"
        }
        text = {

#Pie Chart
    defined_text = {
        name = GetValueToPopType
        text = {
            trigger = {
                state = 1
            }
            localization_key = "GFX_slaves_pie_chart_segment"
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                state = 2
            }
            localization_key = "GFX_peasants_pie_chart_segment"
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                state = 3
            }
            localization_key = "GFX_laborers_pie_chart_segment"
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                state = 4
            }
            localization_key = "GFX_workers_pie_chart_segment"
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                state = 5
            }
            localization_key = "GFX_professionals_pie_chart_segment"
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                state = 6
            }
            localization_key = "GFX_specialists_pie_chart_segment"
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                state = 7
            }
            localization_key = "GFX_aristocrats_pie_chart_segment"
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                state = 8
            }
            localization_key = "GFX_capitalists_pie_chart_segment"
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                state = 9
            }
            localization_key = "GFX_bureaucrats_pie_chart_segment"
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                state = 10
            }
            localization_key = "GFX_soldiers_pie_chart_segment"
        }
    }

#Buildings
    defined_text = {
        name = GetIndustrialCapacityText
        text = {
            trigger = {
                check_variable = { industrial_capacity_use > industrial_capacity }
            }
            localization_key = "industrial_capacity_over_loc"
        }
        text = {
            localization_key = "industrial_capacity_under_loc"
        }
    }

    #Urban Buildings
        defined_text = {
            name = GetUrbanBuildingBackground
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    set_temp_variable = { gubb = v }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_[?gubb.GetTokenKey]_background"
            }
        }
        defined_text = {
            name = GetUrbanBuildingIcon
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    set_temp_variable = { gubb = v }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_[?gubb.GetTokenKey]_icon"
            }
        }
        defined_text = {
            name = GetUrbanBuildingResourceIcon
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    set_temp_variable = { gubri = v }
                    set_temp_variable = { gubrii = global.building_output_resource_1@var:gubri }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_[?gubrii.GetTokenKey]"
            }
        }
        defined_text = {
            name = GetUrbanBuildingSize
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
                    set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                }
                localization_key = "[?bld_tmp]"
            }
        }
        defined_text = {
            name = GetUrbanBuildingProductivity
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
                    set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = productivity@var:bld_tkn }
                }
                localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|2]"
            }
        }
        defined_text = {
            name = GetUrbanBuildingProductivityColor
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
                    set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = productivity@var:bld_tkn }
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp > average_wage@var:bld_tkn }
                }
                localization_key = green_loc
            }
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp < average_wage@var:bld_tkn }
                }
                localization_key = red_loc
            }
            text = {
                localization_key = yellow_loc
            }
        }
        defined_text = {
            name = GetUrbanBuildingPMButton
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
                    set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = production_method@var:bld_tkn }
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp = 0 }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_production_method_basic_button"
            }
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp = 1 }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_production_method_advanced_button"
            }
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp = 2 }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_production_method_industrialized_button"
            }
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp = 3 }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_production_method_mechanized_button"
            }
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp = 4 }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_production_method_electrified_button"
            }
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp = 5 }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_production_method_motorized_button"
            }
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp = 6 }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_production_method_modernized_button"
            }
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp = 7 }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_production_method_roboticized_button"
            }
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp = 8 }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_production_method_computerized_button"
            }
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp = 9 }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_production_method_digitalized_button"
            }
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp = 10 }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_production_method_automatized_button"
            }
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp = 11 }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_production_method_futurized_button"
            }
            text = {
                localization_key = "GFX_production_method_basic_button"
            }
        }
        defined_text = {
            name = GetUrbanBuildingNextPMButton
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
                    set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = production_method@var:bld_tkn }
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp = -1 }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_production_method_basic_button"
            }
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp = 0 }
                }
                localization_key = "GFX_production_method_advanced_button"
            }
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { bld_tmp = 1 }
                }

                        trigger = {
                            set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }

                            NOT = { check_variable = { bld_tmp = 0 } }
                        }
                        localization_key = "urban_building_production_1_tt"
                    }
                }

            #
            
            #Input1
                defined_text = {
                    name = GetUrbanBuildingInput1
                    text = {
                        trigger = {
                            set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 0 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_basic_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 1 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_advanced_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 2 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_industrialized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 3 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_mechanized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 4 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_electrified_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 5 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_motorized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 6 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_modernized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 7 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_roboticized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 8 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_computerized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 9 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_digitalized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 10 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_automatized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 11 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_futurized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            NOT = { check_variable = { bld_tmp = 0 } }
                        }
                        localization_key = "urban_building_input_1_tt"
                    }
                }
                defined_text = {
                    name = GetUrbanBuildingInput1Name
                    text = {
                        trigger = {
                            set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 0 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_basic_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 1 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_advanced_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 2 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_industrialized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 3 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_mechanized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 4 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_electrified_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {

                            NOT = { check_variable = { bld_tmp = 0 } }

                        localization_key = "urban_building_industrial_capacity_usage_tt"
                    }
                }

                    }
                }

            #Basic
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingBasicPrerequisites
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { gicc = v }
							set_temp_variable = { gicct = global.building_basic_tech_unlock@var:gicc }
							check_variable = { gicct = 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_basic_never_tt"
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							check_variable = { gicct = 1 }
						}
						localization_key = ""
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							controller = { has_tech = var:gicct }
						}
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_basic_tech_yes_tt"
					}
					text = {
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_basic_tech_no_tt"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingBasicTech
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_basic_tech_unlock@var:bld_tkn }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp.GetTokenLocalizedKey]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingBasicProfit
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_basic_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o3 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 50 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3+=]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingBasicProductivity
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_basic_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o3 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_basic_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_basic_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_basic_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_basic_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_basic_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_basic_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_basic_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
                            multiply_temp_variable = { gip_employees = size_modifier_temp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_employees }

                            set_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = 0 }
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 50 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_employees }
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp < gip_profit }
						}
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3G]"
					}
                    text = {
                        trigger = {
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp > gip_profit }
                        }
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3R]"
                    }
                    text = {
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3Y]"
                    }
				}
                #Main Production
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingBasicProduction1
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_basic_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            check_variable = { bld_tmp > 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_basic_production_1_tt"
					}
                    text = {
                        localization_key = ""
                    }
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingBasicProduction1Amount
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_basic_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = throughput_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = output_modifier_temp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"
					}

                            check_variable = { bld_tmp > 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_basic_production_4_tt"
					}
                    text = {
                        localization_key = ""
                    }
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingBasicProduction4Amount
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_basic_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = throughput_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = output_modifier_temp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"
					}
				}

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_basic_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size_modifier_temp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"
					}
				}
            #
            #Advanced
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingAdvancedPrerequisites
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { gicc = v }
							set_temp_variable = { gicct = global.building_advanced_tech_unlock@var:gicc }
							check_variable = { gicct = 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_advanced_never_tt"
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							check_variable = { gicct = 1 }
						}
						localization_key = ""
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							controller = { has_tech = var:gicct }
						}
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_advanced_tech_yes_tt"
					}
					text = {
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_advanced_tech_no_tt"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingAdvancedTech
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_advanced_tech_unlock@var:bld_tkn }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp.GetTokenLocalizedKey]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingAdvancedProfit
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_advanced_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_advanced_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o3 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_advanced_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_advanced_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_advanced_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_advanced_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_advanced_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_advanced_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_advanced_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_advanced_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_advanced_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_advanced_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_advanced_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}

								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_advanced_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_advanced_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }

				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingAdvancedProductivity
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_advanced_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_advanced_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_advanced_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_advanced_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_advanced_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_advanced_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_advanced_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_advanced_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_advanced_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_advanced_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_advanced_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_advanced_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_advanced_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_advanced_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_advanced_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_advanced_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_advanced_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_advanced_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_advanced_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_advanced_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_advanced_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_advanced_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
                            multiply_temp_variable = { gip_employees = size_modifier_temp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_employees }

                            set_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = 0 }
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_advanced_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 50 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_employees }
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp < gip_profit }
						}
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3G]"
					}
                    text = {
                        trigger = {
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp > gip_profit }
                        }
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3R]"
                    }

                    }

				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingAdvancedProduction2
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_advanced_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
                            check_variable = { bld_tmp > 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_advanced_production_2_tt"
					}
                    text = {
                        localization_key = ""
                    }
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingAdvancedProduction2Amount
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_advanced_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = throughput_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = output_modifier_temp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"
					}
				}

						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
                            OR = {
                                check_variable = { global.building_advanced_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_advanced_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_advanced_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_advanced_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_advanced_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                            }
						}

				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingAdvancedSpecialists
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_advanced_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
                            check_variable = { bld_tmp > 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_advanced_specialists_tt"
					}
                    text = {
                        localization_key = ""
                    }
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingAdvancedSpecialistsAmount
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_advanced_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size_modifier_temp }
						}
