            #
            #Futurized
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingFuturizedPrerequisites
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { gicc = v }
							set_temp_variable = { gicct = global.building_futurized_tech_unlock@var:gicc }
							check_variable = { gicct = 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_futurized_never_tt"
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							check_variable = { gicct = 1 }
						}
						localization_key = ""
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							controller = { has_tech = var:gicct }
						}
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_futurized_tech_yes_tt"
					}
					text = {
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_futurized_tech_no_tt"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingFuturizedTech
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_futurized_tech_unlock@var:bld_tkn }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp.GetTokenLocalizedKey]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingFuturizedProfit
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_futurized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o3 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 50 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3+=]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingFuturizedProductivity
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_futurized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o3 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_futurized_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_futurized_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_futurized_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_futurized_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_futurized_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_futurized_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_futurized_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
                            multiply_temp_variable = { gip_employees = size_modifier_temp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_employees }

                            set_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = 0 }
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 50 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_employees }
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp < gip_profit }
						}
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3G]"
					}
                    text = {
                        trigger = {
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp > gip_profit }
                        }
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3R]"
                    }
                    text = {
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3Y]"
                    }
				}
                #Main Production
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingFuturizedProduction1
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_futurized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            check_variable = { bld_tmp > 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_futurized_production_1_tt"
					}
                    text = {
                        localization_key = ""
                    }
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingFuturizedProduction1Amount
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_futurized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = throughput_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = output_modifier_temp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingFuturizedProduction2
					text = {

                #Input
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingFuturizedInputs
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
                            OR = {
                                check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                            }
						}
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_futurized_inputs_tt"
					}
                    text = {
                        localization_key = ""
                    }
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingFuturizedInput1
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            check_variable = { bld_tmp > 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "urban_building_pm_futurized_input_1_tt"
					}
                    text = {
                        localization_key = ""
                    }
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetUrbanBuildingFuturizedInput1Amount
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = throughput_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = input_modifier_temp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"
					}
				}

            #
        #

		#Construction Tooltip
            defined_text = {
                name = GetBuildingConstructionTooltip
                text = {
                    trigger = {
                        NOT = { check_variable = { v = token:building_subsistence_farm } }
                        NOT = { check_variable = { v = token:building_rice_paddy } }
						is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
                    }
                    localization_key = "building_build_tt"
                }
				text = {
					localization_key = "building_cant_build_tt"
				}
            }
            defined_text = {
                name = GetBuildingConstructionPredictedAmount
				text = {
					trigger = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { size@var:v > 0 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { pm_temp = production_method@var:v }
						}
						else = {
							return_latest_production_method = yes
						}
						
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 0 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_basic_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 1 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_advanced_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 2 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_industrialized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 3 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_mechanized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 4 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_electrified_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 5 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_motorized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 6 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_modernized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 7 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_roboticized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 8 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_computerized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 9 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_digitalized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 10 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_automatized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 11 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_futurized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
					}
					localization_key = "[?gcpa|3]"
				}
            }
            defined_text = {
                name = GetBuildingConstructionPredictedTotalCost
				text = {
					trigger = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { size@var:v > 0 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { pm_temp = production_method@var:v }
						}
						else = {
							return_latest_production_method = yes
						}
						
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 0 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_basic_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 1 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_advanced_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 2 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_industrialized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 3 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_mechanized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 4 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_electrified_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 5 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_motorized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 6 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_modernized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 7 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_roboticized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 8 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_computerized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 9 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_digitalized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 10 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_automatized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 11 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_futurized_construction_amount@var:v }
						}
						multiply_temp_variable = { gcpa = price@token:resource_industrial_goods }
					}
					localization_key = "[?gcpa|3]"
				}
            }
            defined_text = {
                name = GetBuildingConstructionPredictedSpeed
				text = {
					trigger = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { size@var:v > 0 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { pm_temp = production_method@var:v }
						}
						else = {
							return_latest_production_method = yes
						}
						
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 0 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_basic_construction_speed@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 1 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_advanced_construction_speed@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 2 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_industrialized_construction_speed@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 3 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_mechanized_construction_speed@var:v }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { pm_temp = 4 }
							}
							set_temp_variable = { gcpa = global.building_electrified_construction_speed@var:v }

							limit = {

							}

            #
            
            #Input1
                defined_text = {
                    name = GetRuralBuildingInput1
                    text = {
                        trigger = {
                            set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
                            if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 0 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_basic_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 1 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_advanced_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 2 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_industrialized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 3 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_mechanized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 4 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_electrified_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 5 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_motorized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 6 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_modernized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 7 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_roboticized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 8 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_computerized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 9 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_digitalized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 10 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_automatized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            else_if = {
                                limit = {
                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 11 }
                                }
                                set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_futurized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            }
                            NOT = { check_variable = { bld_tmp = 0 } }
                        }
                        localization_key = "rural_building_input_1_tt"
                    }
                }

                                    check_variable = { production_method@var:bld_tkn = 7 }

                    localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"
                }

        #Production Method Tooltip
            defined_text = {
                name = GetRuralBuildingProductionMethod
                text = {
                    trigger = {
                        set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
                        set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = production_method@var:bld_tkn }
                        check_variable = { bld_tmp = 0 }
                    }
                    localization_key = "rural_building_pm_basic_full_tt"
                }
                text = {
                    trigger = {
                        check_variable = { bld_tmp = 1 }
                    }
                    localization_key = "rural_building_pm_advanced_full_tt"
                }
                text = {
                    trigger = {
                        check_variable = { bld_tmp = 2 }
                    }
                    localization_key = "rural_building_pm_industrialized_full_tt"
                }
                text = {
                    trigger = {
                        check_variable = { bld_tmp = 3 }
                    }
                    localization_key = "rural_building_pm_mechanized_full_tt"
                }
                text = {
                    trigger = {
                        check_variable = { bld_tmp = 4 }
                    }
                    localization_key = "rural_building_pm_electrified_full_tt"
                }
                text = {
                    trigger = {
                        check_variable = { bld_tmp = 5 }
                    }
                    localization_key = "rural_building_pm_motorized_full_tt"
                }
                text = {
                    trigger = {
                        check_variable = { bld_tmp = 6 }
                    }
                    localization_key = "rural_building_pm_modernized_full_tt"
                }
                text = {
                    trigger = {
                        check_variable = { bld_tmp = 7 }
                    }
                    localization_key = "rural_building_pm_roboticized_full_tt"
                }
                text = {
                    trigger = {
                        check_variable = { bld_tmp = 8 }
                    }
                    localization_key = "rural_building_pm_computerized_full_tt"
                }
                text = {
                    trigger = {
                        check_variable = { bld_tmp = 9 }
                    }
                    localization_key = "rural_building_pm_digitalized_full_tt"
                }
                text = {
                    trigger = {
                        check_variable = { bld_tmp = 10 }
                    }
                    localization_key = "rural_building_pm_automatized_full_tt"
                }
                text = {
                    trigger = {
                        check_variable = { bld_tmp = 11 }
                    }
                    localization_key = "rural_building_pm_futurized_full_tt"
                }
                text = {
                    localization_key = "rural_building_pm_basic_full_tt"
                }

                        check_variable = { bld_tmp = -1 }

            #Basic
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingBasicPrerequisites
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { gicc = v }
							set_temp_variable = { gicct = global.building_basic_tech_unlock@var:gicc }
							check_variable = { gicct = 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_basic_never_tt"
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							check_variable = { gicct = 1 }
						}
						localization_key = ""
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							controller = { has_tech = var:gicct }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_basic_tech_yes_tt"
					}
					text = {
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_basic_tech_no_tt"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingBasicTech
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_basic_tech_unlock@var:bld_tkn }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp.GetTokenLocalizedKey]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingBasicProfit
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_basic_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o3 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 50 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3+=]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingBasicProductivity
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_basic_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o3 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_basic_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_basic_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_basic_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_basic_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_basic_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_basic_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_basic_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_basic_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_basic_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
                            multiply_temp_variable = { gip_employees = size_modifier_temp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_employees }

                            set_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = 0 }
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_basic_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 50 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_employees }
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp < gip_profit }
						}
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3G]"
					}
                    text = {
                        trigger = {
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp > gip_profit }
                        }
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3R]"
                    }
                    text = {
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3Y]"
                    }
				}
                #Main Production
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingBasicProduction1
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_basic_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            check_variable = { bld_tmp > 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_basic_production_1_tt"
					}
                    text = {
                        localization_key = ""
                    }
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingBasicProduction1Amount
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_basic_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = throughput_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = output_modifier_temp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingBasicProduction2
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }

                #Input
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingBasicInputs
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
                            OR = {
                                check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_basic_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                            }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_basic_inputs_tt"
					}
                    text = {
                        localization_key = ""
                    }
				}

							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_basic_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }

				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingBasicInput3Amount
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_basic_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = throughput_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = input_modifier_temp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"
					}
				}
