            #
            #Computerized
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingComputerizedPrerequisites
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { gicc = v }
							set_temp_variable = { gicct = global.building_computerized_tech_unlock@var:gicc }
							check_variable = { gicct = 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_computerized_never_tt"
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							check_variable = { gicct = 1 }
						}
						localization_key = ""
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							controller = { has_tech = var:gicct }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_computerized_tech_yes_tt"
					}
					text = {
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_computerized_tech_no_tt"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingComputerizedTech
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_computerized_tech_unlock@var:bld_tkn }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp.GetTokenLocalizedKey]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingComputerizedProfit
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_computerized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_computerized_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o3 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_computerized_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_computerized_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_computerized_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_computerized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_computerized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_computerized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_computerized_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_computerized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_computerized_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_computerized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_computerized_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_computerized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_computerized_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 50 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3+=]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingComputerizedProductivity
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_computerized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_computerized_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o3 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_computerized_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_computerized_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_computerized_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_computerized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_computerized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_computerized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_computerized_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_computerized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_computerized_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_computerized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_computerized_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_computerized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_computerized_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_computerized_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_computerized_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_computerized_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_computerized_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_computerized_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_computerized_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_computerized_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
                            multiply_temp_variable = { gip_employees = size_modifier_temp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_employees }

                            set_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = 0 }
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_computerized_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 50 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_employees }
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp < gip_profit }
						}
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3G]"
					}
                    text = {
                        trigger = {
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp > gip_profit }
                        }
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3R]"
                    }
                    text = {
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3Y]"
                    }
				}
                #Main Production
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingComputerizedProduction1
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_computerized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            check_variable = { bld_tmp > 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_computerized_production_1_tt"
					}
                    text = {
                        localization_key = ""
                    }
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingComputerizedProduction1Amount
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_computerized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = throughput_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = output_modifier_temp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"
					}
				}

						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_computerized_shipping_capacity_tt"
					}
                    text = {
                        localization_key = ""
                    }
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingComputerizedShippingCapacityAmount
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_computerized_output_shipping_capacity@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { capacity_modifier_temp = building_shipping_capacity_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { capacity_modifier_temp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = capacity_modifier_temp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"
					}
				}
                #Input
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingComputerizedInputs
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
                            OR = {
                                check_variable = { global.building_computerized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_computerized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_computerized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_computerized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_computerized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                            }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_computerized_inputs_tt"
					}

							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = throughput_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = input_modifier_temp }

            #
            #Digitalized
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingDigitalizedPrerequisites
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { gicc = v }
							set_temp_variable = { gicct = global.building_digitalized_tech_unlock@var:gicc }
							check_variable = { gicct = 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_digitalized_never_tt"
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							check_variable = { gicct = 1 }
						}
						localization_key = ""
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							controller = { has_tech = var:gicct }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_digitalized_tech_yes_tt"
					}
					text = {
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_digitalized_tech_no_tt"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingDigitalizedTech
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_digitalized_tech_unlock@var:bld_tkn }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp.GetTokenLocalizedKey]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingDigitalizedProfit
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_digitalized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_digitalized_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o3 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_digitalized_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_digitalized_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_digitalized_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_digitalized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_digitalized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_digitalized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_digitalized_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_digitalized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_digitalized_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_digitalized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_digitalized_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_digitalized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_digitalized_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 50 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3+=]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingDigitalizedProductivity
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_digitalized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_digitalized_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o3 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_digitalized_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_digitalized_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_digitalized_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_digitalized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_digitalized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_digitalized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_digitalized_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_digitalized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_digitalized_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_digitalized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_digitalized_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_digitalized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_digitalized_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_digitalized_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_digitalized_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_digitalized_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_digitalized_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_digitalized_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_digitalized_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_digitalized_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
                            multiply_temp_variable = { gip_employees = size_modifier_temp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_employees }

                            set_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = 0 }
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_digitalized_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 50 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_employees }
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp < gip_profit }
						}
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3G]"
					}
                    text = {
                        trigger = {
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp > gip_profit }
                        }
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3R]"
                    }
                    text = {
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3Y]"
                    }
				}
                #Main Production
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingDigitalizedProduction1
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_digitalized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            check_variable = { bld_tmp > 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_digitalized_production_1_tt"
					}
                    text = {
                        localization_key = ""
                    }
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingDigitalizedProduction1Amount

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_digitalized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = throughput_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = output_modifier_temp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"

					name = GetRuralBuildingDigitalizedProduction4Amount
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_digitalized_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = throughput_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = output_modifier_temp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingDigitalizedProduction5
					text = {

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_digitalized_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
                            check_variable = { bld_tmp > 0 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_digitalized_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size_modifier_temp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"
					}
				}
            #
            #Automatized
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingAutomatizedPrerequisites
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { gicc = v }
							set_temp_variable = { gicct = global.building_automatized_tech_unlock@var:gicc }
							check_variable = { gicct = 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_automatized_never_tt"
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							check_variable = { gicct = 1 }
						}
						localization_key = ""
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							controller = { has_tech = var:gicct }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_automatized_tech_yes_tt"
					}
					text = {
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_automatized_tech_no_tt"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingAutomatizedTech
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_automatized_tech_unlock@var:bld_tkn }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp.GetTokenLocalizedKey]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingAutomatizedProfit
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_automatized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_automatized_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o3 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_automatized_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_automatized_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_automatized_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_automatized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_automatized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_automatized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_automatized_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_automatized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_automatized_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_automatized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_automatized_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }

								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }

								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_automatized_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }

								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }

				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingAutomatizedProductivity
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_automatized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_automatized_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o3 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_automatized_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_automatized_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_automatized_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_automatized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_automatized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_automatized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_automatized_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_automatized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_automatized_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_automatized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_automatized_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_automatized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_automatized_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_automatized_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_automatized_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_automatized_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_automatized_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_automatized_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_automatized_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_automatized_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
                            multiply_temp_variable = { gip_employees = size_modifier_temp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_employees }

                            set_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = 0 }
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_automatized_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 50 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_employees }
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp < gip_profit }
						}
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3G]"
					}
                    text = {
                        trigger = {
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp > gip_profit }
                        }
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3R]"
                    }
                    text = {
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3Y]"
                    }
				}
                #Main Production
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingAutomatizedProduction1
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_automatized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            check_variable = { bld_tmp > 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_automatized_production_1_tt"
					}
                    text = {
                        localization_key = ""
                    }
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingAutomatizedProduction1Amount
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_automatized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = throughput_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = output_modifier_temp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"
					}
				}
