            #Futurized
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingFuturizedPrerequisites
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { gicc = v }
							set_temp_variable = { gicct = global.building_futurized_tech_unlock@var:gicc }
							check_variable = { gicct = 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_futurized_never_tt"
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							check_variable = { gicct = 1 }
						}
						localization_key = ""
					}
					text = {
						trigger = {
							controller = { has_tech = var:gicct }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_futurized_tech_yes_tt"
					}
					text = {
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_futurized_tech_no_tt"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingFuturizedTech
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_futurized_tech_unlock@var:bld_tkn }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp.GetTokenLocalizedKey]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingFuturizedProfit
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_futurized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o3 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = size@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 50 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3+=]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingFuturizedProductivity
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o1 = global.building_output_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o2 = global.building_output_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o3 = global.building_output_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o4 = global.building_output_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_o5 = global.building_output_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = building_input_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { input_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = building_size_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { size_modifier_temp = 1 }

							#Revenue
							set_temp_variable = { gip_profit = price@var:bld_o1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = global.building_futurized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_2@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o3 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_3@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o4 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_4@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }
                            
							set_temp_variable = { gip_temp = price@var:bld_o5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_temp = global.building_futurized_output_5@var:bld_tkn }
                            add_to_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_temp }

							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = output_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_profit = throughput_modifier_temp }

							#Expenses
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_1@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_1@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_2@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_3@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_4@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_4@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
								}
								set_temp_variable = { gip_imr = global.building_futurized_input_resource_5@var:bld_tkn }

								set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_input_amount_5@var:bld_tkn }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = price@var:gip_imr }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = input_modifier_temp }
								multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = throughput_modifier_temp }
								subtract_from_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_exp }
							}
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_futurized_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_futurized_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_futurized_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_futurized_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_futurized_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_futurized_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { gip_employees = global.building_futurized_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
                            multiply_temp_variable = { gip_employees = size_modifier_temp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { gip_profit = gip_employees }

                            set_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = 0 }
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_peasants_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 1 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_laborers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 2 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_workers_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 5 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_professionals_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 10 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_specialists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 20 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_aristocrats_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 30 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }
							
							set_temp_variable = { gip_exp = global.building_futurized_capitalists_employment@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = 50 }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = size_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { gip_exp = base_wage@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_exp }

                            divide_temp_variable = { avg_wage_temp = gip_employees }
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp < gip_profit }
						}
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3G]"
					}
                    text = {
                        trigger = {
                            check_variable = { avg_wage_temp > gip_profit }
                        }
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3R]"
                    }
                    text = {
						localization_key = "[?gip_profit|3Y]"
                    }
				}
                #Main Production
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingFuturizedProduction1
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_futurized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
                            check_variable = { bld_tmp > 0 }
						}
						localization_key = "rural_building_pm_futurized_production_1_tt"
					}
                    text = {
                        localization_key = ""
                    }
				}
				defined_text = {
					name = GetRuralBuildingFuturizedProduction1Amount
					text = {
						trigger = {
							set_temp_variable = { bld_tkn = v }

							set_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = building_output_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { output_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = building_throughput_factor@var:bld_tkn }
							add_to_temp_variable = { throughput_modifier_temp = 1 }

							set_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = global.building_futurized_output_1@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = size@var:bld_tkn }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = throughput_modifier_temp }
							multiply_temp_variable = { bld_tmp = output_modifier_temp }
						}
						localization_key = "[?bld_tmp|3]"
					}
				}
				defined_text = {

                                check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_2@var:bld_tkn > 0 }
                                check_variable = { global.building_futurized_input_amount_3@var:bld_tkn > 0 }

#Resources
    defined_text = {
        name = GetFoodResourceStatus
        text = {
            trigger = {
                check_variable = { trade_value@token:resource_food > 0 }
            }
            localization_key = surplus_loc
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                check_variable = { trade_value@token:resource_food < 0 }
            }
            localization_key = deficit_loc
        }
        text = {
            localization_key = balanced_loc
        }
    }
    defined_text = {
        name = GetRawMaterialsResourceStatus
        text = {
            trigger = {
                check_variable = { trade_value@token:resource_raw_materials > 0 }
            }
            localization_key = surplus_loc
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                check_variable = { trade_value@token:resource_raw_materials < 0 }

        name = GetStateGDPGrowthColor

                check_variable = { annual_gdp_growth > 0 }
            }
            localization_key = green_loc
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                check_variable = { annual_gdp_growth < 0 }
            }
            localization_key = red_loc
        }
        text = {
            localization_key = yellow_loc
        }

#Infrastructure
    defined_text = {
        name = GetInfrastructureCrumblingColor
        text = {
            trigger = {
                check_variable = { infrastructure_crumbling_ticks > 0 }
                check_variable = { infrastructure_industrial_goods_fulfilled_percentage < global.infrastructure_crumbling_threshold }
            }
            localization_key = red_loc
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                check_variable = { infrastructure_crumbling_ticks > 0 }
                NOT = { check_variable = { infrastructure_industrial_goods_fulfilled_percentage < global.infrastructure_crumbling_threshold } }
            }
            localization_key = yellow_loc
        }
    }
    defined_text = {
        name = GetInfrastructureCrumbling
        text = {
            trigger = {
                check_variable = { infrastructure_crumbling_ticks > 0 }
                check_variable = { infrastructure_industrial_goods_fulfilled_percentage < global.infrastructure_crumbling_threshold }
            }
            localization_key = infrastructure_crumbling_warning_tt
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                check_variable = { infrastructure_crumbling_ticks > 0 }
                NOT = { check_variable = { infrastructure_industrial_goods_fulfilled_percentage < global.infrastructure_crumbling_threshold } }
            }
            localization_key = infrastructure_restoring_warning_tt
        }
    }

#National Bank
    #Borrowing Money
        defined_text = {
            name = GetBorrowMoneyIntroduction
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { ROOT.borrow_money_country = THIS }
                }
                localization_key = borrow_money_country_will_borrow
            }
            text = {
                localization_key = borrow_money_country_borrow
            }
        }
        defined_text = {
            name = GetBorrowMoneyAnyIntroduction
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    check_variable = { ROOT.borrow_money_country = 0 }
                }
                localization_key = borrow_money_country_will_borrow
            }
            text = {
                localization_key = borrow_money_country_borrow
            }
        }

        defined_text = {
            name = GetBorrowMoneyBank
            text = {
                trigger = {
                    tag = ROOT
                }
                localization_key = borrow_money_country_foreign_bank
            }
            text = {
                localization_key = borrow_money_country_domestic_bank
            }
        }

#Trade
	#Trade Routes
		#GetTradeRouteResourceName
			defined_text = {
				name = GetTradeRouteResourceName
				text = {
					trigger = {
						set_temp_variable = { tr_temp = trade_route_resource^show_trade_route_index^i }
					}
					localization_key = "[?tr_temp.GetTokenLocalizedKey]"
				}
			}
		#
		#GetTradeRouteResourceTextIcon
			defined_text = {
				name = GetTradeRouteResourceTextIcon
				text = {
					trigger = {
						set_temp_variable = { tr_temp = trade_route_resource^show_trade_route_index^i }
					}
					localization_key = "GFX_[?tr_temp.GetTokenKey]_texticon"
				}
			}
		#
		#GetTradeRouteResourceIcon
			defined_text = {
				name = GetTradeRouteResourceIcon
				text = {
					trigger = {
						set_temp_variable = { tr_temp = trade_route_resource^show_trade_route_index^i }
					}
					localization_key = "GFX_[?tr_temp.GetTokenKey]"
				}
			}
		#
		#GetTradeRouteImporterName
			defined_text = {
				name = GetTradeRouteImporterName
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { trade_route_type^show_trade_route_index^i = 1 } #Import
					}
					localization_key = "[THIS.GetNameWithFlag]"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { trade_route_type^show_trade_route_index^i = -1 } #Export
						set_temp_variable = { tr_c_temp = trade_route_country^show_trade_route_index^i }
					}
					localization_key = "[?tr_c_temp.GetNameWithFlag]"
				}
			}
		#
		#GetTradeRouteImporterFlag
			defined_text = {
				name = GetTradeRouteImporterFlag
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { trade_route_type^show_trade_route_index^i = 1 } #Import
					}
					localization_key = "[THIS.GetFlag]"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { trade_route_type^show_trade_route_index^i = -1 } #Export
						set_temp_variable = { tr_c_temp = trade_route_country^show_trade_route_index^i }
					}
					localization_key = "[?tr_c_temp.GetFlag]"
				}
			}
		#
		#GetTradeRouteExporterName
			defined_text = {
				name = GetTradeRouteExporterName
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { trade_route_type^show_trade_route_index^i = 1 } #Import
						set_temp_variable = { tr_c_temp = trade_route_country^show_trade_route_index^i }
					}
					localization_key = "[?tr_c_temp.GetNameWithFlag]"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { trade_route_type^show_trade_route_index^i = -1 } #Export
					}
					localization_key = "[THIS.GetNameWithFlag]"
				}
			}
		#
		#GetTradeRouteExporterFlag
			defined_text = {
				name = GetTradeRouteExporterFlag
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { trade_route_type^show_trade_route_index^i = 1 } #Import
						set_temp_variable = { tr_c_temp = trade_route_country^show_trade_route_index^i }
					}
					localization_key = "[?tr_c_temp.GetFlag]"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { trade_route_type^show_trade_route_index^i = -1 } #Export
					}
					localization_key = "[THIS.GetFlag]"
				}
			}
		#
		#GetTradeRouteProductivity
			defined_text = {
				name = GetTradeRouteProductivity
				text = {
					trigger = {
						set_temp_variable = { tr_temp = trade_route_productivity^show_trade_route_index^i }
						check_variable = { tr_temp > 0 }
					}
					localization_key = "[GetGreen]+$[?tr_temp|3]"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { tr_temp < 0 }
						multiply_temp_variable = { tr_temp = -1 }
					}
					localization_key = "[GetRed]-$[?tr_temp|3]"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { tr_temp = 0 }
					}
					localization_key = "[GetYellow]$[?tr_temp|3]"
				}
			}
		#
		#GetTradeRoutePrice
			defined_text = {
				name = GetTradeRoutePrice
				text = {
					trigger = {
						#calculate cost
						set_temp_variable = { tr_cost_temp = trade_route_productivity^show_trade_route_index^i }
						#set_temp_variable = { tr_resource_temp = trade_route_resource^show_trade_route_index^i }
						check_variable = { tr_cost_temp < 0.1 }
					}
					localization_key = "GFX_price_very_cheap_texticon"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { tr_cost_temp < 0.3 }
					}
					localization_key = "GFX_price_cheap_texticon"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { tr_cost_temp < 0.6 }
					}
					localization_key = "GFX_price_slightly_cheap_texticon"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { tr_cost_temp < 1 }
					}
					localization_key = "GFX_price_average_texticon"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { tr_temp < 2 }
					}
					localization_key = "GFX_price_slightly_expensive_texticon"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { tr_cost_temp < 5 }
					}
					localization_key = "GFX_price_expensive_texticon"
				}
				text = {
					localization_key = "GFX_price_very_expensive_texticon"
				}
			}
		#
	#
	#Macro Section
		#GetSelectedResource
			defined_text = {
				name = GetSelectedResource
				text = {
					trigger = {
						OR = {
							is_in_array = { global.resource_token_array = selected_resource }
							is_in_array = { global.military_resource_token_array = selected_resource }
						}
					}
					localization_key = "[?selected_resource.GetTokenLocalizedKey]"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						has_country_flag = new_trade_route_view_open
					}
					localization_key = "selected_resource_choose_loc"
				}
				text = {
					localization_key = "selected_resource_all_loc"
				}
			}
		#
		#GetSelectedResourceIcon
			defined_text = {
				name = GetSelectedResourceIcon
				text = {
					trigger = {
						OR = {
							is_in_array = { global.resource_token_array = selected_resource }
							is_in_array = { global.military_resource_token_array = selected_resource }
						}
					}
					localization_key = "GFX_[?selected_resource.GetTokenKey]"
				}
				text = {
					localization_key = "GFX_gdp_icon"
				}
			}
		#
		#GetSelectedResourceTrade
			defined_text = {
				name = GetSelectedResourceTrade
				text = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_in_array = { global.resource_token_array = selected_resource }
								is_in_array = { global.military_resource_token_array = selected_resource }
							}
						}
					}
					localization_key = "selected_resource_choose_loc"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { offers@var:selected_resource < 0 }
						check_variable = { offers@var:selected_resource = trade@var:selected_resource }
						set_temp_variable = { tmp = offers@var:selected_resource }
						multiply_temp_variable = { tmp = -1 }
					}
					localization_key = "net_exporting"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { offers@var:selected_resource < 0 }
						set_temp_variable = { tmp = offers@var:selected_resource }
						multiply_temp_variable = { tmp = -1 }
						set_temp_variable = { percent_temp = trade@var:selected_resource }
						divide_temp_variable = { percent_temp = offers@var:selected_resource }
					}
					localization_key = "net_exporting_capped"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { offers@var:selected_resource > 0 }
						check_variable = { offers@var:selected_resource = trade@var:selected_resource }
					}
					localization_key = "net_importing"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { offers@var:selected_resource > 0 }
						set_temp_variable = { percent_temp = trade@var:selected_resource }
						divide_temp_variable = { percent_temp = offers@var:selected_resource }
					}
					localization_key = "net_importing_capped"
				}
				text = {
					localization_key = "net_no_trade"
				}
			}
			defined_text = {
				name = GetSelectedResourceTradeActual
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { offers@var:selected_resource < 0 }
						set_temp_variable = { tmp = trade@var:selected_resource }
						multiply_temp_variable = { tmp = -1 }
					}
					localization_key = "[?tmp]"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { offers@var:selected_resource > 0 }
					}
					localization_key = "[?trade@var:selected_resource]"
				}
				text = {
					localization_key = "net_no_trade"
				}
			}
		#
		#GetImportButton
			defined_text = {
				name = GetImportButton
				text = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = { has_country_flag = new_route_export }
						has_country_flag = new_trade_route_view_open
					}
					localization_key = "GFX_new_import_route_button_pressed"
				}
				text = {
					localization_key = "GFX_new_import_route_button"
				}
			}
		#
		#GetExportButton
			defined_text = {
				name = GetExportButton
				text = {
					trigger = {
						has_country_flag = new_route_export
						has_country_flag = new_trade_route_view_open
					}
					localization_key = "GFX_new_export_route_button_pressed"
				}
				text = {
					localization_key = "GFX_new_export_route_button"
				}
			}
		#
		#GetTradeAICheckbox
			defined_text = {
				name = GetTradeAICheckbox
				text = {
					trigger= {
						has_variable = trade_ai@var:selected_resource
					}
					localization_key = "GFX_generic_checkbox_unticked"
				}
				text = {
					localization_key = "GFX_generic_checkbox_ticked"
				}
			}
		#
	#
    #New Trade Route
		#GetNewRouteImporterFlag
			defined_text = {
				name = GetNewRouteImporterFlag
				text = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = { has_country_flag = new_route_export } #Import
					}
					localization_key = "[THIS.GetFlag]"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						set_temp_variable = { tr_c_temp = new_route_list_country_array^i }
					}
					localization_key = "[?tr_c_temp.GetFlag]" #Export
				}
			}
		#
		#GetNewRouteExporterFlag
			defined_text = {
				name = GetNewRouteExporterFlag
				text = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = { has_country_flag = new_route_export } #Import
						set_temp_variable = { tr_c_temp = new_route_list_country_array^i }
					}
					localization_key = "[?tr_c_temp.GetFlag]"
				}
				text = {
					localization_key = "[THIS.GetFlag]" #Export
				}
			}
		#
		#GetNewRouteProductivity
			defined_text = {
				name = GetNewRouteProductivity
				text = {
					trigger = {
						set_temp_variable = { tr_temp = new_route_list_productivity_array^i }
						check_variable = { tr_temp > 0 }
					}
					localization_key = "[GetGreen]+$[?tr_temp|3]"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { tr_temp < 0 }
						multiply_temp_variable = { tr_temp = -1 }
					}
					localization_key = "[GetRed]-$[?tr_temp|3]"
				}
				text = {
					trigger = {
						check_variable = { tr_temp = 0 }
					}
					localization_key = "[GetYellow]$[?tr_temp|3]"
				}
			}
		#
		#GetNewRouteAmount
			defined_text = {
				name = GetNewRouteAmount
				text = {
					trigger = {
						has_country_flag = new_route_export
					}
					localization_key = "-[?global.shipping_amount@var:selected_resource|3]"
				}
				text = {
					localization_key = "+[?global.shipping_amount@var:selected_resource|3]"
				}
			}
		#

#Topbar
	defined_text = {
        name = GetMoneyAmountTopbar
		text = {
            trigger = {
                set_temp_variable = {treasury_temp = treasury}
				divide_temp_variable = {treasury_temp = 1000000}
				check_variable = {treasury > 999999.99}
            }
            localization_key = "[?treasury_temp|2]M"
        }
        text = {
            trigger = {
                set_temp_variable = {treasury_temp = treasury}
				divide_temp_variable = {treasury_temp = 1000}
				check_variable = {treasury > 999.99}
            }
            localization_key = "[?treasury_temp|2]K"
        }
        text = {
            localization_key = "[?treasury|2]"
        }
    }
